Astrum Solar <http://www.solar4worcester.com>
A Message from Our Partner Program
Turn Customers into Profits: Join Us at a Special Event. Hurry, there's only a few tickets left!
<http://solarforworcester.eventbrite.com>
Tuesday, August 26 7:00 PM – 8:00 PM Courtyard Worcester | 72 Grove Street | Worcester, MA 01605
Because you are a valued Partner in Massachusetts, Astrum Solar would like to inform you about a special event in Worcester. Astrum Solar will be hosting a free Solar Seminar on August 26 for all Massachusetts residents, families, and friends! Join us for a short presentation and learn about the money-saving and environmental benefits of going solar with Astrum. Refreshments will be served.
An expert will be on hand to answer any questions about what’s involved in going solar and to assess solar potential and electricity savings for Massachusetts residents. This is a great opportunity for your customers to learn about the benefits of going solar, and for you to get rewarded for referring them. Make money by talking to your customers about solar today! Encourage them to reserve their spot at this special event—and reserve your spot as well!
There’s only a few tickets left. Reserve your spot today so you don’t miss this special event!
Reserve your spot today and spread the word! <http://solarforworcester.eventbrite.com>
Get Rewarded and Save Your Customers Money
Astrum Solar’s turnkey process makes it easy to switch to solar. Our team of solar experts personally handles every detail and turns a complex process into one that is smooth, simple and carefree for your customers. With our solar financing options, your customers can go solar for $0 Down and start saving from day one and keep saving year after year. Talk to your customers in Massachusetts today and refer them to us. For every Massachusetts home owner you refer to us that completes a site survey, you get paid, and your cash bonus is even higher if they become one of our customers. You’ll earn $100/Qualified Lead* and $750/Sale!
$1,000 Discount for Massachusetts Residents!
When you refer your customers in Massachusetts to Astrum Solar, they will enjoy their independence from unpredictable electricity prices and lock in their own electricity rates. Choosing solar will put them in control of their own power generation and free them from ever-increasing utility rates. In addition to these benefits, they’ll receive a $1,000 discount through September 30!** Encourage your customers to request their free roof surveys today to take advantage of this special offer!
Submit your Massachusetts leads today! <http://partners.astrumsolar.com>
See a Sunny Day in a Whole New Way Call Us: 800-903-6130 ext. 825
You are receiving this email because you are a member of the Astrum Solar Partner Program.
*A qualified lead is when the referral prospect agrees to a roof evaluation (i.e. site survey) by Astrum Solar.
**LIMITED TIME OFFER: Valid for qualifying homes that sign a new solar system contract with Astrum Solar by September 30, 2014. In lieu of a cash rebate, customers can opt to use the $1,000 as a down payment to reduce their monthly solar fees or to receive a $1,000 discount off the contract price at the time of their purchase. Otherwise, $1,000 cash back rebate to be mailed approximately 30 days after the system is installed. Minimum system size is 5 kW. Qualifying homes must be located in a territory that Astrum Solar serves. Offer is in addition to other available promotions or discounts.
A solar power system is customized for your home, so pricing, savings, utility bill and solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. Financing terms vary by location and are not available in all areas. MA 168228
